definition.name: enable-password-subscribe
definition.description: If true, allows passwords to flow from the Identity Vault to the connected system.

definition.name: enable-password-publish
definition.description: If true, allows passwords to flow from the connected system to the Identity Vault.

definition.name: publish-password-to-nds
definition.description: Use the password from the connected system to set the non-reversible NDS password in eDirectory.

definition.name: publish-password-to-dp
definition.description: Use the password from the connected system to set the NMAS Distribution Password used for Identity Manager password synchronization.

definition.display-name: Require password policy validation before publishing passwords
definition.name: enforce-password-policy
definition.description: If true, applies NMAS password policies during publish password operations. Password is not written to the data store if it does not comply.

definition.display-name: Reset user's external system password to the IDM password on failure
definition.name: reset-external-password-on-failure
definition.description: If true, on a publish Distribution Password failure, attempt to reset the password in the connected system using the Distribution Password from the Identity Vault.

definition.display-name: Notify the user of password synchronization failure via e-mail
definition.name: notify-user-on-password-dist-failure
ConnectedSystemName
definition.description: The name of the connected system, application or Identity Manager driver. This value is used by the e-mail notification templates.
